main.title: general settings
main.explanation: Here you'll find the general settings like notifications and language.
main.notificationPerms: We need to get your permissions to send desktop notifications. You won't be asked again when accepted.

mailbox.title: mailbox settings
mailbox.explanation: Here you can add new mailboxes, manage existing ones and pair mailboxes to SMTP clients.

sessions.title: session settings
sessions.explanation: Here you can view the current existing sessions and kill them if you need to.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.send_desc: Send a desktop notification when a new Email is received.
